headline: NRG Energy Secures Loan for New Texas Natural Gas Power Plant
summary: NRG Energy Inc. (NYSE:NRG) is one of the best performing S&P 500 stocks to buy now. On August 4, NRG Energy announced that it finalized a loan agreement with the Public Utility Commission of Texas/PUCT and received initial funding for a new natural gas generation project.
